text: Tongbram is a Meetei family. It is native to Ancient Kangleipak (Antique Manipur). People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India.http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/surname.aspx?surname=Tongbramhttp://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/originoffamilyname.aspx?surname=Tongbram == References == Category:Meitei surnames
title: Tongbram
